q: of Republicans who like Mitch Daniels ' broad experience and fiscal credentials. Mitch Daniels has said he won't make a decision about running for president until after this year's legislative season ends in April. If( Mitch Daniels ) runs, I think it's hard for Mike Pence , because all the financial base in Indiana would likely go to Mitch Daniels , Charlie Black said. But Mike Pence also can't afford to wait to decide because he has a long way to go in building a fundraising network and a campaign team, and becoming better-known.

Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept.`` No state needs to declare bankruptcy,'' Bill Lockyer said, The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't. Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments that lack the capacity to repay their debts. '' Bill Stephan , a friend of Mike Pence 's since they attended the Indiana University School of Law-Indianapolis together, said Mike Pence was always clear on what he stood for and what he was passionate about. I just remember Mike Pence as someone who, even then, wore his heart on his sleeve, Bill Stephan said. Mike Pence said he embraced the Republican Party while attending law school, largely because he heard in Ronald Reagan `` the manifestation of the kind of traditional American ideals that I was raised to believe in
